name: Hot Wheels TechMods
description:
***App to be used with Hot Wheels TechMods Remote Controlled Vehicle Only***

The remote control car, reimagined. Build your car from the chassis up using the Neoflex panels and rivets then enter a gaming experience like none other. Use the app to drive the car, then use the car to drive the app.

- Play classic RC drive mode or amp up the challenge in treasure hunt mode and drive your physical car to find virtual treasures!
- Use the car as a controller to compete and level up in three unique game modes!
- Use coins and treasures collected along the way to level up your digital car, customize your avatar, buy shields, and more.
